General.keyName: Rename selected layer, composition, folder, effect, group, or mask
General.keyTrans: 重命名所选图层、组合、文件夹、效果、组或蒙版

General.keyName: Open selected layer, composition, or footage item
General.keyTrans: 打开所选图层、合成或素材项目

General.keyName: Move selected layers, masks, effects, or render items down (back) or up (forward) in stacking order
General.keyTrans: 将所选图层、蒙版、特效或渲染项按堆叠顺序向下（向后）或向上（向前）移动
General.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Down Arrow or Ctrl Alt Up Arrow

General.keyName: Move selected layers, masks, effects, or render items to bottom (back) or top (front) of stacking order
General.keyTrans: 将所选图层、蒙版、特效或渲染项移动到堆叠顺序的底部（后部）或顶部（前部
General.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift Down Arrow or Ctrl Alt Shift Up Arrow

General.keyName: Extend selection to next item in Project panel, Render Queue panel, or Effect Controls panel
General.keyTrans: 将选择扩展到项目面板、渲染队列面板或效果控制面板中的下一个项目

General.keyName: Extend selection to previous item in Project panel, Render Queue panel, or Effect Controls panel
General.keyTrans: 将选择扩展到项目面板、渲染队列面板或效果控制面板中的上一个项目

General.keyName: Duplicate selected layers, masks, effects, text selectors, animators, puppet meshes, shapes, render items, output modules, or compositions
General.keyTrans: 复制选中的图层、蒙版、特效、文本选择器、动画师、木偶网格、形状、渲染项目、输出模块或组件

General.keyName: Display filename corresponding to the frame at the current time in the Info panel
General.keyTrans: 在信息面板中显示当前时间帧对应的文件名

Projects.keyTrans: 在项目面板中新建文件夹

Projects.keyName: Cycle through color bit depths for project
Projects.keyTrans: 循环查看项目的色彩位深
Projects.keyValue: Alt-click bit-depth button at bottom of Project panel
Click bit-depth button at bottom of Project panel

Preferences.keyValue: Hold down Ctrl Alt Shift while starting After Effects

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Project panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭项目面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Render Queue panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭渲染队列面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Tools panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭 “工具 ”面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Info panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭信息面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Preview panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭预览面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Audio panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭音频面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Effects & Presets panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭特效和预设面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Character panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭字符面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Paragraph panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭段落面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Paint panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭画笔面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Brushes panel
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭画笔面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open or close Effect Controls panel for selected layer
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开或关闭选定图层的效果控制面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open Flowchart panel for project flowchart
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 为项目流程图打开流程图面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Switch to workspace
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 切换到工作区
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyValue: Shift F10, Shift F11, or Shift F12

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Close active viewer or panel (closes content first)
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 关闭活动查看器或面板（先关闭内容）

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Close active panel or all viewers of type of active viewer (closes content first). For example, if a Timeline panel is active, this command closes all Timeline panels.
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 关闭活动面板或活动查看器类型的所有查看器（先关闭内容）。例如，如果时间线面板处于活动状态，则此命令会关闭所有时间线面板。

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Split the frame containing the active viewer and create a viewer with opposite locked/unlocked state
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 分割包含活动查看器的框架，并创建一个锁定/解锁状态相反的查看器

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Maximize or restore panel under pointer
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 最大化或还原指针下的面板

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Resize application window or floating window to fit screen. (Press again to resize window so that contents fill the screen.)
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 调整应用程序窗口或浮动窗口大小以适应屏幕。(再次按下可调整窗口大小，使内容充满屏幕）。

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Move application window or floating window to main monitor; resize window to fit screen. (Press again to resize window so that contents fill the screen.)
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 将应用程序窗口或浮动窗口移到主监视器上；调整窗口大小以适应屏幕。(再次按下可调整窗口大小，使内容充满屏幕）。

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Toggle activation between Composition panel and Timeline panel for current composition
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 在当前合成面板和时间线面板之间切换激活

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Cycle to previous or next item in active viewer (for example, cycle through open compositions)
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 在活动查看器中循环到上一个或下一个项目（例如，循环查看打开的作品）

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Cycle to previous or next panel in active frame (for example, cycle through open Timeline panels)
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 在活动框架中循环到上一个或下一个面板（例如，循环浏览打开的时间线面板）

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Activate a view in a multi-view layout in the Composition panel without affecting layer selection
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 在合成面板中激活多视图布局中的视图，而不影响图层选择

Activate.keyName: Cycle through tools
Activate.keyTrans: 循环使用工具
Activate.keyValue: Alt-click tool button in Tools panel

Activate.keyName: Activate Selection tool
Activate.keyTrans: 激活选择工具

Activate.keyName: Activate Hand tool
Activate.keyTrans: 激活手形工具

Activate.keyName: Temporarily activate Hand tool
Activate.keyTrans: 暂时激活手形工具
Activate.keyValue: Hold down spacebar or the middle mouse button

Activate.keyName: Activate Zoom In tool
Activate.keyTrans: 激活放大工具

Activate.keyName: Activate Zoom Out tool
Activate.keyTrans: 激活缩小工具
Activate.keyValue: Alt (when Zoom In tool is active)

Activate.keyName: Activate Rotation tool
Activate.keyTrans: 激活旋转工具

Activate.keyName: Activate Roto Brush tool
Activate.keyTrans: 激活旋转画笔工具

Activate.keyName: Activate Refine Edge tool
Activate.keyTrans: 激活锐化边缘工具

Activate.keyName: Activate and cycle through Camera tools (Unified Camera, Orbit Camera, Track XY Camera, and Track Z Camera)
Activate.keyTrans: 激活并循环使用 “摄像机 ”工具（统一摄像机、轨道摄像机、跟踪 XY 摄像机和跟踪 Z 摄像机）

Activate.keyName: Activate Pan Behind tool
Activate.keyTrans: 激活背后平移工具

Activate.keyName: Activate and cycle through mask and shape tools (Rectangle, Rounded Rectangle, Ellipse, Polygon, Star)
Activate.keyTrans: 激活并循环使用遮罩和形状工具（矩形、圆角矩形、椭圆、多边形、星形）

Activate.keyName: Activate and cycle through Type tools (Horizontal and Vertical)
Activate.keyTrans: 激活并循环使用 “类型 ”工具（水平和垂直）

Activate.keyName: Activate and cycle between the Pen and Mask Feather tools. (Note: You can turn off this setting in the Preferences dialog box.)
Activate.keyTrans: 激活并循环使用钢笔和蒙版羽化工具。(注：可在首选项对话框中关闭此设置。）

Activate.keyName: Temporarily activate Selection tool when a pen tool is selected
Activate.keyTrans: 选择钢笔工具时暂时激活选择工具

Activate.keyName: Temporarily activate Pen tool when the Selection tool is selected and pointer is over a path (Add Vertex tool when pointer is over a segment; Convert Vertex tool when pointer is over a vertex)
Activate.keyTrans: 选择 “选择 ”工具且指针位于路径上时，临时激活钢笔工具（指针位于线段上时，添加顶点工具；指针位于顶点上时，转换顶点工具）

Activate.keyName: Activate and cycle through Brush, Clone Stamp, and Eraser tools
Activate.keyTrans: 激活并循环使用画笔、克隆图章和橡皮擦工具

Activate.keyName: Activate and cycle through Puppet tools
Activate.keyTrans: 激活并循环使用傀儡工具

Activate.keyName: Temporarily convert Selection tool to Shape Duplication tool
Activate.keyTrans: 将 “选择 ”工具临时转换为 “形状复制 ”工具

Activate.keyName: Temporarily convert Selection tool to Direct Selection tool
Activate.keyTrans: 将 “选择 ”工具临时转换为 “直接选择 ”工具

Composition.keyName: Open Composition Settings dialog box for selected composition
Composition.keyTrans: 为选定的组合打开 “组合设置 ”对话框

Composition.keyName: Set beginning or end of work area to current time
Composition.keyTrans: 将工作区的开始或结束设置为当前时间

Composition.keyName: Set work area to duration of selected layers or, if no layers are selected, set work area to composition duration
Composition.keyTrans: 将工作区设置为所选图层的持续时间，如果没有选择图层，则将工作区设置为合成持续时间

Composition.keyName: Open Composition Mini-Flowchart for active composition
Composition.keyTrans: 打开活动合成的微型流程图

Composition.keyName: Activate the most recently active composition that is in the same composition hierarchy (network of nested compositions) as the currently active composition
Composition.keyTrans: 激活与当前活动合成处于同一合成层次结构（嵌套合成网络）中的最近活动合成

Time navigation.keyName: Go to beginning or end of work area
Time navigation.keyTrans: 转到工作区的开始或结束

Time navigation.keyName: Go to previous or next visible item in time ruler (keyframe, layer marker, work area beginning or end)
Time navigation.keyTrans: 转到时间标尺中的上一个或下一个可见项（关键帧、图层标记、工作区起点或终点）

Time navigation.keyName: (Note: Also goes to beginning, end, or base frame of Roto Brush span if viewing Roto Brush in Layer panel.)
Time navigation.keyTrans: (注：如果在图层面板中查看 Roto Brush，还可转到 Roto Brush 跨度的开始、结束或基本帧）。

Time navigation.keyName: Go to beginning of composition, layer, or footage item
Time navigation.keyTrans: 转到构图、图层或镜头项目的起始位置
Time navigation.keyValue: Home or Ctrl Alt Left Arrow

Time navigation.keyName: Go to end of composition, layer, or footage item
Time navigation.keyTrans: 转到构图、图层或素材项目的末尾
Time navigation.keyValue: End or Ctrl Alt Right Arrow
Page Down or Ctrl Right Arrow
Shift Page Down or Ctrl Shift Right Arrow
Page Up or Ctrl Left Arrow
Shift Page Up or Ctrl Shift Left Arrow

Time navigation.keyName: Go to previous In point or Out point
Time navigation.keyTrans: 转到上一个输入点或输出点

Time navigation.keyName: Go to next In point or Out point
Time navigation.keyTrans: 转到下一个输入点或输出点

Time navigation.keyName: Scroll to current time in Timeline panel
Time navigation.keyTrans: 在时间线面板中滚动到当前时间

Previews.keyValue: Spacebar, 0 on numeric keypad, Shift 0 on numeric keypad

Previews.keyName: Reset preview settings to replicate RAM Preview and Standard Preview behaviors
Previews.keyTrans: 重置预览设置以复制 RAM 预览和标准预览行为

Previews.keyName: Preview only audio, from current time
Previews.keyTrans: 仅预览音频，从当前时间开始

Previews.keyName: Preview only audio, in work area
Previews.keyTrans: 仅预览工作区中的音频

Previews.keyValue: Drag or Alt-drag current-time indicator, depending on Live Update setting

Previews.keyName: Preview number of frames specified by Alternate Preview preference (defaults to 5)
Previews.keyTrans: 预览替代预览首选项指定的帧数（默认为 5）
切换水星传输视频预览

Previews.keyValue: Shift F5, Shift F6, Shift F7, or Shift F8

Previews.keyTrans: 在活动查看器中显示快照

Previews.keyValue: Ctrl Shift F5, Ctrl Shift F6, Ctrl Shift F7, or Ctrl Shift F8

Previews.keyTrans: 快速预览 > 自适应分辨率
快速预览 > 快速草稿

Views.keyName: Turn display color management on or off for active view
Views.keyTrans: 打开或关闭活动视图的显示色彩管理

Views.keyName: Show red, green, blue, or alpha channel as grayscale
Views.keyTrans: 以灰度显示红色、绿色、蓝色或 alpha 通道

Views.keyName: Show colorized red, green, or blue channel
Views.keyTrans: 显示着色的红色、绿色或蓝色通道
Views.keyValue: Alt Shift 1, Alt Shift 2, Alt Shift 3

Views.keyName: Toggle showing straight RGB color
Views.keyTrans: 切换显示直接 RGB 颜色

Views.keyName: Show alpha boundary (outline between transparent and opaque regions) in Layer panel
Views.keyTrans: 在图层面板中显示 alpha 边界（透明和不透明区域之间的轮廓

Views.keyName: Show alpha overlay (colored overlay on transparent regions) in Layer panel
Views.keyTrans: 在图层面板中显示 alpha 叠加（透明区域上的彩色叠加

Views.keyName: Show Refine Edge X-ray
Views.keyTrans: 显示细化边缘 X 光

Views.keyName: Center composition in the panel
Views.keyTrans: 在面板中将构图居中

Views.keyName: Zoom-in in Composition, Layer, or Footage panel
Views.keyTrans: 在合成、图层或素材面板中放大

Views.keyName: Zoom-out in Composition, Layer, or Footage panel
Views.keyTrans: 在合成、图层或素材面板中缩小

Views.keyName: Zoom to 100% in Composition, Layer, or Footage panel
Views.keyTrans: 在合成、图层或素材面板中放大至 100%

Views.keyName: Zoom to fit in Composition, Layer, or Footage panel
Views.keyTrans: 在 “合成”、“图层 ”或 “素材 ”面板中放大至适合的大小

Views.keyName: Zoom up to 100% to fit in Composition, Layer, or Footage panel
Views.keyTrans: 在合成、图层或素材面板中放大至 100%以适应

Views.keyName: Set resolution to Full, Half, or Custom in Composition panel
Views.keyTrans: 在合成面板中将分辨率设置为全分辨率、半分辨率或自定义分辨率
Views.keyValue: Ctrl J, Ctrl Shift J, Ctrl Alt J

Views.keyName: Open View Options dialog box for active Composition panel
Views.keyTrans: 打开活动合成面板的 “视图选项 ”对话框

Views.keyName: Zoom out time
Views.keyTrans: 缩小时间

Views.keyName: Zoom in Timeline panel to single-frame units (Press again to zoom out to show entire composition duration.)
Views.keyTrans: 在时间线面板中缩放为单帧单位（再次按下可缩放显示整个合成持续时间。）

Views.keyName: Zoom out in Timeline panel to show the entire composition duration (Press again to zoom back in to the duration specified by the Time Navigator.)
Views.keyTrans: 在时间线面板中缩小以显示整个合成持续时间（再次按下可放大至时间导航器指定的持续时间。）

Views.keyName: Prevent images from being rendered for previews in viewer panels
Views.keyTrans: 防止在查看器面板中渲染预览图像

Views.keyName: Show or hide safe zones
Views.keyTrans: 显示或隐藏安全区域

Views.keyName: Show or hide grid
Views.keyTrans: 显示或隐藏网格

Views.keyName: Show or hide proportional grid
Views.keyTrans: 显示或隐藏比例网格

Views.keyName: Show or hide rulers
Views.keyTrans: 显示或隐藏标尺

Views.keyName: Show or hide guides
Views.keyTrans: 显示或隐藏导线

Views.keyName: Turn snapping to grid on or off
Views.keyTrans: 打开或关闭网格捕捉

Views.keyName: Turn snapping to guides on or off
Views.keyTrans: 打开或关闭对导线的抓取

Views.keyName: Lock or unlock guides
Views.keyTrans: 锁定或解锁导线

Views.keyName: Show or hide layer controls (masks, motion paths, light and camera wireframes, effect control points, and layer handles)
Views.keyTrans: 显示或隐藏图层控制（遮罩、运动路径、灯光和摄像机线框、效果控制点和图层控制柄）

Footage.keyName: Import one file or image sequence
Footage.keyTrans: 导入一个文件或图像序列

Footage.keyName: Import multiple files or image sequences
Footage.keyTrans: 导入多个文件或图像序列

Footage.keyName: Open movie in an After Effects Footage panel
Footage.keyTrans: 在 After Effects 片段面板中打开影片
Footage.keyValue: Double-click the footage item in the Project panel

Footage.keyName: Add selected items to most recently activated composition
Footage.keyTrans: 将选定项目添加到最近激活的合成中

Footage.keyName: Replace selected source footage for selected layers with footage item selected in Project panel
Footage.keyTrans: 将选定图层的选定源素材替换为项目面板中选定的素材项目

Footage.keyName: Replace source for a selected layer
Footage.keyTrans: 替换选定图层的源素材
Footage.keyValue: Alt-drag footage item from Project panel onto selected layer

Footage.keyName: Delete a footage item without a warning
Open Interpret Footage dialog box for selected footage item
Footage.keyTrans: 为选定的素材项目打开 “解释素材 ”对话框

Footage.keyName: Edit selected footage item in application with which it’s associated (Edit Original)
Footage.keyTrans: 在与之关联的应用程序中编辑选定的素材项（编辑原始素材）
重新载入选定的镜头项目

Footage.keyName: Set proxy for selected footage item
Footage.keyTrans: 为选定的镜头项目设置代理

Effects and animation presets.keyName: Delete all effects from selected layers
Effects and animation presets.keyTrans: 删除所选图层中的所有效果

Effects and animation presets.keyName: Apply most recently applied effect to selected layers
Effects and animation presets.keyTrans: 将最近应用的效果应用到选定图层

Effects and animation presets.keyName: Apply most recently applied animation preset to selected layers
Effects and animation presets.keyTrans: 将最近应用的动画预设应用到选定图层

Layers.keyName: New solid layer
Layers.keyTrans: 新建实体图层

Layers.keyName: New null layer
Layers.keyTrans: 新建空图层

Layers.keyName: New adjustment layer
Layers.keyTrans: 新建调整图层

Layers.keyName: Select layer (1-999) by its number (enter digits rapidly for two-digit and three-digit numbers)
Layers.keyTrans: 按编号选择图层 (1-999)（快速输入两位数和三位数的数字）

Layers.keyName: Toggle selection of layer (1-999) by its number (enter digits rapidly for two-digit and three-digit numbers)
Layers.keyTrans: 按编号切换选择图层（1-999）（两位数和三位数请快速输入数字）

Layers.keyName: Select next layer in stacking order
Layers.keyTrans: 按堆叠顺序选择下一层

Layers.keyName: Select previous layer in stacking order
Layers.keyTrans: 按堆叠顺序选择上一层

Layers.keyName: Extend selection to next layer in stacking order
Layers.keyTrans: 按堆叠顺序选择下一层

Layers.keyName: Extend selection to previous layer in stacking order
Layers.keyTrans: 按堆叠顺序将选择扩展到上一层

Layers.keyName: Deselect all layers
Layers.keyTrans: 取消选择所有图层

Layers.keyName: Scroll topmost selected layer to top of Timeline panel
Layers.keyTrans: 将最上面的选定图层滚动到时间线面板的顶部

Layers.keyName: Show or hide Parent column
Layers.keyTrans: 显示或隐藏父列

Layers.keyName: Show or hide Layer Switches and Modes columns
Layers.keyTrans: 显示或隐藏图层开关和模式列

Layers.keyName: Setting the sampling method for selected layers (Best/Bilinear)
Layers.keyTrans: 设置所选图层的取样方法（最佳/线性）

Layers.keyName: Setting the sampling method for selected layers (Best/Bicubic)
Layers.keyTrans: 设置所选图层的采样方法（最佳/三次方）

Layers.keyName: Turn off all other solo switches
Layers.keyTrans: 关闭所有其他独奏开关

Layers.keyName: Turn Video (eyeball) switch on or off for selected layers
Layers.keyTrans: 打开或关闭所选图层的视频（眼球）开关

Layers.keyName: Turn off Video switch for all video layers other than selected layers
Layers.keyTrans: 为选定图层以外的所有视频图层关闭视频开关

Layers.keyName: Open settings dialog box for selected solid, light, camera, null, or adjustment layer
Layers.keyTrans: 打开所选实体、光源、相机、空图层或调整图层的设置对话框

Layers.keyName: Paste layers at current time
Layers.keyTrans: 在当前时间粘贴图层

Layers.keyName: Split selected layers. (If no layers are selected, split all layers.)
Layers.keyTrans: 分割所选图层。(如果没有选中图层，则分割所有图层）。

Layers.keyName: Precompose selected layers
Layers.keyTrans: 预合成所选图层

Layers.keyName: Open Effect Controls panel for selected layers
Layers.keyTrans: 打开所选图层的效果控制面板

Layers.keyName: Open layer in Layer panel (opens source composition for precomposition layer in Composition panel)
Layers.keyTrans: 在图层面板中打开图层（在合成面板中为预合成图层打开源合成）

Layers.keyName: Open source of a layer in Footage panel (opens precomposition layer in Layer panel)
Layers.keyTrans: 在素材面板中打开图层源（在图层面板中打开预合成图层）

Layers.keyName: Reverse selected layers in time
Layers.keyTrans: 在时间上反转所选图层

Layers.keyName: Enable time remapping for selected layers
Layers.keyTrans: 启用所选图层的时间重映射

Layers.keyName: Move selected layers so that their In point or Out point is at the current time
Layers.keyTrans: 移动所选图层，使其输入点或输出点位于当前时间

Layers.keyName: Trim In point or Out point of selected layers to current time
Layers.keyTrans: 将所选图层的 “输入点 ”或 “输出点 ”修剪为当前时间

Layers.keyName: Add or remove expression for a property
Layers.keyTrans: 添加或删除属性表达式

Layers.keyName: Add an effect (or multiple selected effects) to selected layers
Layers.keyTrans: 为选定图层添加效果（或多个选定效果
Layers.keyValue: Double-click effect selection in Effects & Presets panel

Layers.keyName: Set In point or Out point by time-stretching
Layers.keyTrans: 通过时间拉伸设置输入点或输出点

Layers.keyName: Move selected layers so that their In point is at beginning of composition
Layers.keyTrans: 移动所选图层，使其输入点位于合成开始处

Layers.keyName: Move selected layers so that their Out point is at end of composition
Layers.keyTrans: 移动所选图层，使其输出点位于合成结束处

Layers.keyName: Lock selected layers
Layers.keyTrans: 锁定所选图层

Layers.keyName: Unlock all layers
Layers.keyTrans: 解锁所有图层

Layers.keyName: Set Quality to Best, Draft, or Wireframe for selected layers
Layers.keyTrans: 将所选图层的质量设置为最佳、草稿或线框
Layers.keyValue: Ctrl U, Ctrl Shift U, or Ctrl Alt Shift U

Layers.keyName: Cycle forward or backward through blending modes for selected layers
Layers.keyTrans: 向前或向后循环所选图层的混合模式
Layers.keyValue: Shift - (hyphen) or Shift = (equal sign) on the main keyboard

Layers.keyName: Find in Timeline panel
Layers.keyTrans: 在时间线面板中查找

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 在时间线面板中查找

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Toggle expansion of selected layers to show all properties
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 切换所选图层的展开以显示所有属性

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Toggle expansion of property group and all child property groups to show all properties
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 切换展开属性组和所有子属性组以显示所有属性
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyValue: Ctrl-click triangle to the left of the property group name

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Show only Anchor Point property (for lights and cameras, Point Of Interest)
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 仅显示锚点属性（用于灯光和摄像机，兴趣点）
只显示音频电平属性
只显示遮罩羽化属性
只显示遮罩路径属性
只显示遮罩不透明度属性

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Show only Opacity property (for lights, Intensity)
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 仅显示不透明度属性（用于灯光，强度）
仅显示位置属性

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Show only Rotation and Orientation properties
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 仅显示旋转和方向属性
仅显示缩放属性
仅显示时间重映射属性

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Show only instances of missing effects
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 只显示缺失效果的实例
仅显示效果属性组
只显示遮罩属性组

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Show only Material Options property group
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 只显示材质选项属性组
仅显示表达式
显示具有关键帧的属性
仅显示已修改的属性

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Show only paint strokes, Roto Brush strokes, and Puppet pins
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 只显示绘画笔触、Roto 画笔笔触和 Puppet 插针
仅显示音频波形

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Show only selected properties and groups
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 仅显示选定的属性和组
隐藏属性或组
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyValue: Alt Shift-click property or group name

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Add or remove property or group from set that is shown
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 从显示的集合中添加或移除属性或组

Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyName: Add or remove keyframe at current time
Showing properties and groups in the Tim.keyTrans: 添加或删除当前时间的关键帧

Showing properties in the Effect Control.keyName: Toggle expansion of selected effects to show all properties
Showing properties in the Effect Control.keyTrans: 切换所选效果的扩展以显示所有属性

Showing properties in the Effect Control.keyName: Toggle expansion of property group and all child property groups to show all properties
Showing properties in the Effect Control.keyTrans: 切换扩展属性组和所有子属性组以显示所有属性
Showing properties in the Effect Control.keyValue: Ctrl-click triangle to the left of the property group name

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Modify property value by default increments
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 按默认增量修改属性值

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Modify property value by 10x default increments
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 按 10 倍默认增量修改属性值

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Modify property value by 1/10 default increments
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 以 1/10 的默认增量修改属性值

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Open Auto-Orientation dialog box for selected layers
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 为选定图层打开自动调整方向对话框

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Open Opacity dialog box for selected layers
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 为选定图层打开不透明度对话框

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Open Rotation dialog box for selected layers
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 为选定图层打开旋转对话框

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Open Position dialog box for selected layers
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 为选定图层打开位置对话框

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Center-selected layers in view (modifies Position property to place anchor points of selected layers in center of current view)
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 在视图中将所选图层居中（修改 “位置 ”属性，将所选图层的锚点置于当前视图的中心位置）

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Center anchor point in the visible content
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 在可见内容中将锚点居中

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Move selected layers 1 pixel at current magnification (Position)
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 在当前放大倍率下移动所选图层 1 个像素（位置）

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Move selected layers 10 pixels at current magnification (Position)
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 在当前放大倍率下移动所选图层 10 个像素（位置）

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Move selected layers 1 frame earlier or later
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 将选定图层提前或延后 1 帧
Modifying layer properties.keyValue: Alt Page Up or Alt Page Down

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Move selected layers 10 frames earlier or later
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 将选定图层向前或向后移动 10 帧
Modifying layer properties.keyValue: Alt Shift Page Up or Alt Shift Page Down

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Increase or decrease Rotation (Z Rotation) of selected layers by 1°
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 将选定图层的旋转（Z 旋转）角度增大或减小 1 度

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Increase or decrease Rotation (Z Rotation) of selected layers by 10°
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 将所选图层的旋转（Z 旋转）角度增大或减小 10 度
Modifying layer properties.keyValue: Shift (plus) or Shift - (minus) on numeric keypad

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Increase or decrease Opacity (or Intensity for light layers) of selected layers by 1%
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 增加或减少所选图层的不透明度（或浅色图层的强度）1
Modifying layer properties.keyValue: Ctrl Alt (plus) or Ctrl Alt - (minus) on numeric keypad

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Increase or decrease Opacity (or Intensity for light layers) of selected layers by 10%
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 增加或减少所选图层的不透明度（或浅色图层的强度）10
Modifying layer properties.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift (plus) or Ctrl Alt Shift - (minus) on numeric keypad

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Increase Scale of selected layers by 1%
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 将所选图层的缩放比例增大 1
Modifying layer properties.keyValue: Ctrl (plus) or Alt (plus) on numeric keypad

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Decrease Scale of selected layers by 1%
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 将所选图层的缩放比例减小 1%
Modifying layer properties.keyValue: Ctrl - (minus) or Alt - (minus) on numeric keypad

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Increase Scale of selected layers by 10%
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 将所选图层的比例增大 10
Modifying layer properties.keyValue: Ctrl Shift (plus) or Alt Shift (plus) on numeric keypad

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Decrease Scale of selected layers by 10%
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 将所选图层的比例缩小 10
Modifying layer properties.keyValue: Ctrl Shift - (minus) or Alt Shift - (minus) on numeric keypad

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Modify Rotation or Orientation in 45° increments
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 以 45° 为增量修改旋转或方向

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Modify Scale, constrained to footage frame aspect ratio
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 修改缩放比例，受限于镜头画面宽高比
Modifying layer properties.keyValue: Shift-drag layer handle with Selection tool

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Reset Rotation to 0°
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 将旋转角度重置为 0

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Reset Scale to 100%
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 将缩放比例重置为 100%

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Scale and reposition selected layers to fit composition
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 缩放和重新定位所选图层以适应合成

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Scale and reposition selected layers to fit composition width, preserving image aspect ratio for each layer
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 缩放和重新定位所选图层以适应合成宽度，保留每个图层的图像纵横比

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Scale and reposition selected layers to fit composition height, preserving image aspect ratio for each layer
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 缩放和重新定位所选图层以适应合成高度，保留每个图层的图像纵横比

3D Layers.keyTrans: 切换到三维视图 1（默认为前视图）

3D Layers.keyName: Switch to 3D view 2 (defaults to Custom View 1)
3D Layers.keyTrans: 切换到三维视图 2（默认为自定义视图 1）

3D Layers.keyName: Switch to 3D view 3 (defaults to Active Camera)
3D Layers.keyTrans: 切换到 3D 视图 3（默认为活动相机）

3D Layers.keyName: Move the camera and its point of interest to look at selected 3D layers
3D Layers.keyTrans: 移动摄像机及其兴趣点查看选定的 3D 图层

3D Layers.keyName: With a camera tool selected, move the camera and its point of interest to look at selected 3D layers
3D Layers.keyTrans: 在选定摄像机工具的情况下，移动摄像机及其兴趣点查看选定的 3D 图层

3D Layers.keyName: With a camera tool selected, move the camera and its point of interest to look at all 3D layers
3D Layers.keyTrans: 选中相机工具后，移动相机及其兴趣点查看所有三维图层

3D Layers.keyName: Turn Casts Shadows property on or off for selected 3D layers
3D Layers.keyTrans: 打开或关闭所选三维图层的投射阴影属性

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Toggle between Graph Editor and layer bar modes
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 在图形编辑器和图层栏模式之间切换

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Select all keyframes for a property
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 为某个属性选择所有关键帧

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Select all visible keyframes and properties
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 选择所有可见的关键帧和属性

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Deselect all keyframes, properties, and property groups
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 取消选择所有关键帧、属性和属性组
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyValue: Shift F2 or Ctrl Alt Shift A

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Move keyframe 1 frame later or earlier
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 将关键帧向后或向前移动 1 帧
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyValue: Alt Right Arrow or Alt Left Arrow

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Move keyframe 10 frames later or earlier
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 将关键帧向后或向前移动 10 帧
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyValue: Alt Shift Right Arrow or Alt Shift Left Arrow

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Set interpolation for selected keyframes (layer bar mode)
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 为选定的关键帧设置插值（图层条模式）

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Set keyframe interpolation method to hold or Auto Bezier
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 将关键帧插值方法设置为保持或自动贝塞尔插值

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Set keyframe interpolation method to linear or Auto Bezier
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 将关键帧插值方法设置为线性插值或自动贝塞尔插值

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Set keyframe interpolation method to linear or hold
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 将关键帧插值方法设置为线性或保持
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyValue: Ctrl Alt-click in layer bar mode

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 轻松缓和选定的关键帧
轻松缓和选中的关键帧
轻松移出选定的关键帧
为选定的关键帧设置速度

Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyName: Add or remove keyframe at current time. For property shortcuts, see Showing properties and groups in the Timeline panel (keyboard shortcuts).
Keyframes and the Graph Editor.keyTrans: 在当前时间添加或删除关键帧。有关属性快捷键，请参阅在时间线面板中显示属性和组（键盘快捷键）。

Text.keyName: New text layer
Text.keyTrans: 新建文本层
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift T

Text.keyName: Align selected horizontal text left, center, or right
Text.keyTrans: 将选定的水平文本向左、向中或向右对齐
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift L, Ctrl Shift C, or Ctrl Shift R

Text.keyName: Align selected vertical text top, center, or bottom
Text.keyTrans: 将选定的垂直文本对齐顶部、中间或底部
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift L, Ctrl Shift C, or Ctrl Shift R

Text.keyName: Extend or reduce selection by one character to right or left in horizontal text
Text.keyTrans: 在水平文本中向右或向左扩展或缩小一个字符的选区
Text.keyValue: Shift Right Arrow or Shift Left Arrow

Text.keyName: Extend or reduce selection by one word to right or left in horizontal text
Text.keyTrans: 在水平文本中向右或向左扩展或缩小一个字的选区
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift Right Arrow or Ctrl Shift Left Arrow

Text.keyName: Extend or reduce selection by one line up or down in horizontal text
Text.keyTrans: 在水平文本中向上或向下扩展或缩小选区一行
Text.keyValue: Shift Up Arrow or Shift Down Arrow

Text.keyName: Extend or reduce selection by one line to right or left in vertical text
Text.keyTrans: 在竖排文本中向右或向左扩展或缩小一行选区
Text.keyValue: Shift Right Arrow or Shift Left Arrow

Text.keyName: Extend or reduce selection one word up or down in vertical text
Text.keyTrans: 在竖排文本中向上或向下扩展或缩小一个字的选区
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift Up Arrow or Ctrl Shift Down Arrow

Text.keyName: Extend or reduce selection by one character up or down in vertical text
Text.keyTrans: 在垂直文本中向上或向下扩展或缩小一个字符的选区
Text.keyValue: Shift Up Arrow or Shift Down Arrow

Text.keyName: Select text from insertion point to beginning or end of line
Text.keyTrans: 从插入点到行首或行尾选择文本
Text.keyValue: Shift Home or Shift End

Text.keyName: Move insertion point to beginning or end of line
Text.keyTrans: 将插入点移至行首或行尾
Text.keyValue: Home or End

Text.keyName: Select all text on a layer
Text.keyTrans: 选择图层上的所有文本
Text.keyValue: Double-click text layer

Text.keyName: Select text from insertion point to beginning or end of text frame
Text.keyTrans: 从插入点到文本框的开始或结束处选择文本
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift Home or Ctrl Shift End

Text.keyName: To mouse-click point, select text from insertion point
Text.keyTrans: 鼠标点击点，从插入点选择文本
Text.keyValue: Shift-click

Text.keyName: In horizontal text, move insertion point one character left or right; one line up or down; one word left or right; or one paragraph up or down
Text.keyTrans: 在水平文本中，将插入点向左或向右移动一个字符；向上或向下移动一行；向左或向右移动一个单词；或向上或向下移动一个段落
Text.keyValue: Left Arrow or Right Arrow; Up Arrow or Down Arrow; Ctrl Left Arrow or Ctrl Right Arrow; or Ctrl Up Arrow or Ctrl Down Arrow

Text.keyName: In vertical text, move insertion point one character up or down; one left or right; one word up or down; or one paragraph left or right
Text.keyTrans: 在垂直文本中，将插入点向上或向下移动一个字符；向左或向右移动一个字符；向上或向下移动一个单词；或向左或向右移动一个段落
Text.keyValue: Up Arrow or Down Arrow; Left Arrow or Right Arrow; Ctrl Up Arrow or Ctrl Down Arrow; or Ctrl Left Arrow or Ctrl Right Arrow

Text.keyName: Select word, line, paragraph, or entire text frame
Text.keyTrans: 选择单词、行、段落或整个文本框
Text.keyValue: Double-click, triple-click, quadruple-click, or quintuple-click with Type tool

Text.keyName: Turn All Caps on or off for selected text
Text.keyTrans: 打开或关闭所选文本的大小写字母
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift K

Text.keyName: Turn Small Caps on or off for selected text
Text.keyTrans: 打开或关闭所选文本的小写字母
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift K

Text.keyName: Turn Superscript on or off for selected text
Text.keyTrans: 打开或关闭所选文本的上标
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift = (equal sign)

Text.keyName: Turn Subscript on or off for selected text
Text.keyTrans: 打开或关闭所选文本的下标
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift = (equal sign)

Text.keyName: Set horizontal scale to 100% for selected text
Text.keyTrans: 将所选文本的水平缩放比例设置为 100%
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift X

Text.keyName: Set vertical scale to 100% for selected text
Text.keyTrans: 将所选文本的垂直缩放比例设置为 100%
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift X

Text.keyName: Auto leading for selected text
Text.keyTrans: 为选定文本设置自动前导
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift A

Text.keyName: Reset tracking to 0 for selected text
Text.keyTrans: 将所选文本的跟踪重置为 0
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift Q

Text.keyName: Justify paragraph; left align last line
Text.keyTrans: 对齐段落；左对齐最后一行
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift J

Text.keyName: Justify paragraph; right align last line
Text.keyTrans: 对齐段落；右对齐最后一行
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift J

Text.keyName: Justify paragraph; force last line
Text.keyTrans: 对齐段落；强制最后一行
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift F

Text.keyName: Decrease or increase font size of selected text by 2 units
Text.keyTrans: 将选定文本的字体大小缩小或增大 2 个单位
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Shift , (comma) or Ctrl Shift . (period)

Text.keyName: Decrease or increase font size of selected text by 10 units
Text.keyTrans: 将选定文本的字体大小减小或增大 10 个单位
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift , (comma) or Ctrl Alt Shift . (period)

Text.keyName: Increase or decrease leading by 2 units
Text.keyTrans: 将前导增加或减少 2 个单位
Text.keyValue: Alt Down Arrow or Alt Up Arrow

Text.keyName: Increase or decrease leading by 10 units
Text.keyTrans: 增加或减少前导 10 个单位
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Down Arrow or Ctrl Alt Up Arrow

Text.keyName: Decrease or increase baseline shift by 2 units
Text.keyTrans: 将基线偏移减少或增加 2 个单位
Text.keyValue: Alt Shift Down Arrow or Alt Shift Up Arrow

Text.keyName: Decrease or increase baseline shift by 10 units
Text.keyTrans: 减少或增加基线偏移 10 个单位
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift Down Arrow or Ctrl Alt Shift Up Arrow

Text.keyName: Decrease or increase kerning or tracking 20 units (20/1000 ems)
Text.keyTrans: 减少或增加字距或跟踪 20 个单位（20/1000 ems）
Text.keyValue: Alt Left Arrow or Alt Right Arrow

Text.keyName: Decrease or increase kerning or tracking 100 units (100/1000 ems)
Text.keyTrans: 减少或增加字距或跟踪 100 个单位（100/1000 ems）
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Left Arrow or Ctrl Alt Right Arrow

Text.keyName: Toggle paragraph composer
Text.keyTrans: 切换段落构成器
Text.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift T

Masks.keyName: Select all points in a mask

Masks.keyTrans: 选择下一个或上一个掩码
Masks.keyValue: Alt ` (accent grave) or Alt Shift ` (accent grave)

Masks.keyTrans: 进入自由变换蒙版编辑模式
Masks.keyValue: Double-click mask with Selection tool or select mask in Timeline panel and press Ctrl T

Masks.keyTrans: 退出自由变换蒙版编辑模式

Masks.keyName: Scale around center point in Free Transform mode
Masks.keyTrans: 在自由变换模式下围绕中心点缩放

Masks.keyName: Move selected path points 1 pixel at current magnification
Masks.keyTrans: 以当前放大倍率移动所选路径点 1 像素

Masks.keyName: Move selected path points 10 pixels at current magnification
Masks.keyTrans: 以当前放大倍率移动所选路径点 10 个像素

Masks.keyName: Toggle between smooth and corner points
Masks.keyTrans: 在平滑点和角点之间切换

Masks.keyName: Open Mask Feather dialog box for selected mask
Masks.keyTrans: 为选定的蒙板打开蒙板羽化对话框

Masks.keyName: Open Mask Shape dialog box for selected mask
Masks.keyTrans: 为选定的蒙板打开蒙板形状对话框

Paint tools.keyName: Swap paint background color and foreground colors
Paint tools.keyTrans: 调换油漆背景色和前景色

Paint tools.keyName: Set paint foreground color to black and background color to white
Paint tools.keyTrans: 将油漆前景色设置为黑色，背景色设置为白色

Paint tools.keyName: Set foreground color to the color currently under any paint tool pointer
Paint tools.keyTrans: 将前景色设置为当前任何油漆工具指针下的颜色

Paint tools.keyName: Set foreground color to the average color of a 4-pixel x 4-pixel area under any paint tool pointer
Paint tools.keyTrans: 将前景色设置为任何油漆工具指针下 4 像素 x 4 像素区域的平均颜色

Paint tools.keyName: Set brush size for a paint tool
Paint tools.keyTrans: 为绘画工具设置画笔大小

Paint tools.keyName: Set brush hardness for a paint tool
Paint tools.keyTrans: 为绘画工具设置画笔硬度
Paint tools.keyValue: Ctrl-drag, then release Ctrl while dragging

Paint tools.keyName: Join current paint stroke to the previous stroke
Paint tools.keyTrans: 将当前画笔连接到上一个画笔

Paint tools.keyName: Set starting sample point to point currently under Clone Stamp tool pointer
Paint tools.keyTrans: 将起始采样点设置为当前克隆图章工具指针下的点

Paint tools.keyName: Momentarily activate Eraser tool with Last Stroke Only option
Paint tools.keyTrans: 使用 “仅最后一笔 ”选项瞬间激活橡皮擦工具

Paint tools.keyName: Show and move overlay (change Offset value of alignedClone Stamp tool or change Source Position value of unaligned Clone Stamp tool)
Paint tools.keyTrans: 显示和移动叠加（更改已对齐克隆图章工具的偏移值或更改未对齐克隆图章工具的源位置值）
Paint tools.keyValue: Alt Shift-drag with Clone Stamp tool

Paint tools.keyName: Activate a specific Clone Stamp tool preset
Paint tools.keyTrans: 激活特定的克隆图章工具预置

Paint tools.keyName: Duplicate a Clone Stamp tool preset in Paint panel
Paint tools.keyTrans: 在 “油漆 ”面板中复制 “克隆图章 ”工具预设
Paint tools.keyValue: Alt-click the button for the preset

Paint tools.keyName: Set opacity for a paint tool
Paint tools.keyTrans: 为绘画工具设置不透明度

Paint tools.keyName: Set opacity for a paint tool to 100%
Paint tools.keyTrans: 将油漆工具的不透明度设置为 100%

Paint tools.keyName: Set flow for a paint tool
Paint tools.keyValue: Shift a digit on numeric keypad (for example, 9=90%, 1=10%)*

Paint tools.keyName: Set flow for a paint tool to 100%
Paint tools.keyTrans: 将涂画工具的流量设置为 100%

Paint tools.keyName: Move earlier or later by number of frames specified for stroke Duration
Paint tools.keyTrans: 按笔触持续时间指定的帧数提前或延后移动
Paint tools.keyValue: Ctrl Page Up or Ctrl Page Down (or 1 or 2 on the main keyboard)

Shape Layers.keyTrans: 进入自由变换路径编辑模式
Shape Layers.keyValue: Select Path property in Timeline panel and press Ctrl T
Page Up when dragging to create shape
Page Down when dragging to create shape

Shape Layers.keyName: Increase number of points for star or polygon; increase roundness for rounded rectangle
Shape Layers.keyTrans: 增加星形或多边形的点数；增加圆角矩形的圆度
Shape Layers.keyValue: Up Arrow when dragging to create shape

Shape Layers.keyName: Decrease number of points for star or polygon; decrease roundness for rounded rectangle
Shape Layers.keyTrans: 减少星形或多边形的点数；减少圆角矩形的圆度
Shape Layers.keyValue: Down Arrow when dragging to create shape

Shape Layers.keyTrans: 在创建时重新定位形状
Shape Layers.keyValue: Hold spacebar when dragging to create shape

Shape Layers.keyName: Set rounded rectangle roundness to 0 (sharp corners); decrease polygon and star outer roundness
Shape Layers.keyTrans: 将圆角矩形的圆度设置为 0（锐角）；减小多边形和星形的外圆度
Shape Layers.keyValue: Left Arrow when dragging to create shape

Shape Layers.keyName: Set rounded rectangle roundness to maximum; increase polygon and star outer roundness
Shape Layers.keyTrans: 将圆角矩形的圆度设置为最大值；增加多边形和星形的外圆度
Shape Layers.keyValue: Right Arrow when dragging to create shape

Shape Layers.keyName: Constrain rectangles to squares; constrain ellipses to circles; constrain polygons and stars to zero rotation
Shape Layers.keyTrans: 将矩形限制为正方形；将椭圆限制为圆形；将多边形和星形限制为零旋转
Shape Layers.keyValue: Shift when dragging to create shape
Ctrl when dragging to create shape

Markers.keyName: Set marker at current time (works during preview and audio-only preview)
Markers.keyTrans: 在当前时间设置标记（在预览和仅音频预览时有效）

Markers.keyName: Set marker at current time and open marker dialog box
Markers.keyTrans: 在当前时间设置标记并打开标记对话框

Markers.keyName: Set and number a composition marker (0-9) at the current time
Markers.keyTrans: 在当前时间设置合成标记（0-9）并编号

Markers.keyName: Display the duration between two layer markers or keyframes in the Info panel
Markers.keyTrans: 在信息面板中显示两个图层标记或关键帧之间的持续时间

Motion Tracking.keyName: Move feature region, search region, and attach point 1 pixel at current magnification
Motion Tracking.keyTrans: 在当前放大倍率下移动特征区域、搜索区域和附加点 1 个像素

Motion Tracking.keyName: Move feature region, search region, and attach point 10 pixels at current magnification
Motion Tracking.keyTrans: 以当前放大倍率移动特征区域、搜索区域和附加点 10 像素

Motion Tracking.keyName: Move feature region and search region 1 pixel at current magnification
Motion Tracking.keyTrans: 以当前放大倍率移动特征区域和搜索区域 1 个像素

Motion Tracking.keyName: Move feature region and search region 10 pixels at current magnification
Motion Tracking.keyTrans: 以当前放大倍率移动特征区域和搜索区域 10 个像素

Saving, exporting, and rendering.keyName: Add active composition or selected items to render queue
Saving, exporting, and rendering.keyTrans: 将活动构图或选定项目添加到渲染队列

Saving, exporting, and rendering.keyName: Add current frame to render queue
Saving, exporting, and rendering.keyTrans: 将当前帧添加到渲染队列

Saving, exporting, and rendering.keyName: Duplicate render item with same output filename as original
Saving, exporting, and rendering.keyTrans: 以与原始文件相同的输出文件名复制渲染项目

Saving, exporting, and rendering.keyName: Add a composition to the Adobe Media Encoder encoding queue
Saving, exporting, and rendering.keyTrans: 将合成添加到 Adobe 媒体编码器编码队列中

toolTrans: 在时间线面板中显示属性和组
在效果控制面板中显示属性
